abstract: Investigation into the shooting of Phoenix, Ariz, police officer Sgt Sean Drenth remains open 12 months after his death, with the police still not sure whether he took his own life or was murdered; evidence supports both homicide and suicide, and the case has been classified as 'death unknown'.
snippet: Sgt. Sean Drenth was found in a lot with a shotgun on his chest. Suicide? Homicide? Evidence points both ways.
lead_paragraph: Sgt. Sean Drenth was found in a lot with a shotgun on his chest. Suicide? Homicide? Evidence points both ways.

headline.main: Year Later, Officer’s Killing Confounds Colleagues
headline.print_headline: Year Later, Officer’s Killing Confounds Colleagues
headline.seo: Officer Sean Drenth Killing in Phoenix Still Unsolved
